text:
e="preserve">Jeannie Berlin (born Jeannie Brette May, November 1, 1949) is an American actress and screenwriter. She was born in Los Angeles. She is known for her role in the 1972 movie "The Heartbreak Kid", for which she received Academy Award and Golden Globe nominations.
She later played the leading role in "Sheila Levine Is Dead and Living in New York" (1975). She also starred in "Margaret" (2011), "Inherent Vice" (2014) and "Cafe Society" (2016).

annotations.surface_form: Sheila Levine Is Dead and Living in New York
